seo.siteDescription: Tradomatic.io is a convenient platform for finding the best conditions for buying / selling grain, oil and other crops around the world. Use the map to track offers in real time.
seo.profileDeleteMePageDescription: Delete all the information about my user

pwaModal.title: Request to launch the application from the phone screen
pwaModal.description: Allow the system to launch the site from the phone screen?

pwaAndroid.header: Instructions for running a PWA on Android
pwaAndroid.step1: Go to the site in the Chrome browser. Click on the three dots in the upper right corner to open the menu.
pwaAndroid.step3: Click the "Add" button in the pop-up window. The PWA is now installed and available on your home screen.

pwaIos.header: Instructions for running a PWA on iOS
pwaIos.step1: Go to the site in the Safari browser and click the "Share" button.
pwaIos.step2: In the pop-up window, select "Add to Home Screen".
pwaIos.step3: Click "Add" in the upper right corner to complete the installation. The PWA will now be on your home screen.

Thank you for your feedback. It has been successfully sent, and we are already processing it.
Please expect a response from our managers soon.
